content: scorpio leg warmers when the west coast of canada enters scorpio it gets cold fast the damp chill air of the island makes one glad to have a fire stove tea and warm cozy leg warmers on hand to add extra warmth and layers scorpio leg warmers were inspired by a desire to have a thick and soft leg warmer that i could wear in the darker months of the year both around the house and while wandering the winter ocean shore the body ribbing helps the leg warmer hug your leg while the larger gauge ribbing at the bottom allows it to drape over your boot easily it s a very quick knit making length these leg warmers are a generous size and can be worn over other layers of clothing like long socks rights or slim fitting pants if you are unsure on sizing consider that they fit on the larger size and how you are most likely to want to wear them next to your skin or over layers of other clothing if you re interested in customizing the length to make them shorter or longer note that each repetition of the cable pattern increases the overall length by about 3 cm 1 25 inches to add length add in more repetitions of the cable pattern to shorten it decrease the number of repetitions cable abbreviations explained c6b slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and hold at the back of the work knit the following 3 sts from left needle onto the right needle then knit the 3 sts on the cable needle onto the right needle c6f slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and hold in front of the work knit the following 3 sts from left needle onto the right needle then knit the 3 sts on the cable needle
